mapper.select: select * from brand where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select * from brand where cast(id as char) like concat('%', #{id}, '%') and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into brand(name, description, pic_url, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{picUrl}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{beDeleted})
mapper.update: update brand set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, pic_url = #{picUrl}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified}, is_deleted = #{beDeleted} where id = #{id}
